data.fullContent: He was known as "The Deputy Sheriff", Foster was one of the greatest light heavyweight champions in boxing history. He won the undisputed light heavyweight championship from Dick Tiger in 1968 via fourth round knockout, and went on to defend his crown fourteen times in total from 1968 to 1974. Foster challenged heavyweight kings Joe Frazier and Muhammad Ali during his career, but was knocked out by both fighters. He retired from professional boxing in 1978, at the age of 40.
data.answer: 他被称为“副警长”，福斯特是拳击历史上最伟大的轻重量级冠军之一。1968年，他在第四轮淘汰赛中击败迪克·泰格，毫无争议地赢得了轻重量级冠军，并在1968年至1974年期间共十四次卫冕冠军。福斯特在职业生涯中曾挑战重量级拳王乔·弗雷泽和穆罕默德·阿里，但都被这两位拳王击倒。1978年，40岁的他退出了职业拳坛。
